com.bassintag.tekengine.object.scene

Class TekSceneManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.bassintag.tekengine.object.TekObject
      • com.bassintag.tekengine.object.scene.TekSceneManager

  • public class TekSceneManager
extends TekObject
    TekSceneManager.java created for TekEngine Represents the manager holding all scenes of a game

    03/12/2016
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Antoine
